Tucson stops short, eludes the magma and then darts to another tunnel, hopi=
ng that Leo Prime and the others are following him.

" HURRY!  I ONLY CAME =
THIS WAY ONCE BEFORE!  I DON'T KNOW HOW LONG IT WILL REMAIN STABLE!  I DON'=
T THINK WE'RE BEING FOLLOWED SO NOW I CAN LIFT THE RUSE!  I HAD TO DO THAT =
TO FOOL MAGMATRON!  BETTER TO PLAY ALONG AND TRICK THEM THAN RISK LIVES TO =
FIGHT THEM! "

Rattrap rides Quickstride out and winds up beside Tucson.

"=
 I HOPE HE BOUGHT IT WINGS!  BUT THAT WAS GOOOOD ACTING!  DEFINITELY AN ACA=
DEMY AWARD PERFORMANCE!"

Quickstride snorts.

" BRAVO!  NICE JOB PLAYING T=
HE BAD GUY!   YA HAD US ALL FOOLED BACK THRE, WE THOUGHT YA REALLY TURNED O=
N US!"

Tucson looks back.

" ME?!  TURN ON ANYONE INTENTIONALLY!?  THAT'S =
NOT HOW I WORK, QUICKSTRIDE!  CALL IT RECKLESSNESS WITH FINESSE!"
